reports:  A group of conservatives led by former Kansas  Mike Pence   Jim Ryun  plan to start an independent expenditure campaign aimed at getting  Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) to run for president.  "America's President Committee""  will begin a signature-gathering effort this week to encourage  Mike Pence  to get into the presidential race. Mike Pence  said he made the final decision not to run for president Wednesday night. He and his wife told their two daughters and then called their son, who is in college, early Thursday.  We just concluded that while we could seek the presidency, we concluded that our best opportunity to continue to serve the people of Indiana was either in Washington, D.C., or here at home,   Mike Pence  said. Thursday afternoon,  Mike Pence  sent a letter to supporters and told politicians, such as Sens.  Richard Lugar  and  Dan Coats , of his decision.
